validate.name_must_be_string: Route name must be a string.
validate.name_too_long: Name cannot be longer than {maxLength} characters.
validate.waypoint_invalid: Waypoint {index} key {key}: Type is invalid, expect {type}.
validate.waypoints_min_length: Track must have at least {minLength} waypoints.

error.title: Something went wrong
error.clipboard_empty: Clipboard is empty or does not contain valid track data.
error.cannot_load_track_desc: Failed to load track data. Please check the URL.
error.copy_to_clipboard_failed: Failed to copy track data to clipboard.

copy_to_clipboard_failed.title: Error
copy_to_clipboard_failed.desc: Failed to copy track data to clipboard.

normalize_waypoints.title: Normalize Waypoints
normalize_waypoints.desc: Sometimes waypoint rotation is weirdly tilted. This will normalize all waypoints to be straight up (make rotation x,y = 0).

auto_rotate_waypoints.title: Auto Rotate Waypoints
auto_rotate_waypoints.desc: This will automatically rotate all waypoints based on their neighbors position.

delete_waypoint.title: Delete Waypoint
delete_waypoint.desc: Are you sure you want to delete this waypoint?
